Command the forces of The Project in a b.message: Command the forces of The Project in a battle to rebuild the world after mankind has been nearly destroyed by nuclear missiles.

Developed in the 90s by Pumpkin Studios..message: Developed in the 90s by Pumpkin Studios.

Warzone 2100 was originally developed by.message: Warzone 2100 was originally developed by Pumpkin Studios and published by Eidos Interactive.

In 1999, it was released commercially fo.message: In 1999, it was released commercially for Microsoft Windows and Sony PlayStation.

Pumpkin Studios ended their support for.message: Pumpkin Studios ended their support for Warzone 2100 on January 5, 2000.

In 2004, after fan petition, Warzone's s.message: In 2004, after fan petition, Warzone's source code was released publicly under an open-source license.

It has been developed, maintained, and i.message: It has been developed, maintained, and improved by the community ever since, under the banner of the “Warzone 2100 Project”.
